ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I used it on the Maestro (Hymn w/ lute, PR w/ drum, Niv s w/ lute, PR w/ drum).  The only time I got attacked is when he was being pushed up a wall and I
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Mar 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
> On Wed, Mar 15/00, kim@... wrote:
> >
> > At L48 this combo was equivalent to a 32 hp/tick regen (33
> > hp/tick standing). With the entire party damaged (which is
> > almost always the case against the dragons), that means you're
> > healing 192 hp/6 seconds, or roughly the equivalent of a
> > superior heal every 18 seconds. And you never go OOM.
>
> Now that's going to be a taunt.

I used it on the Maestro (Hymn w/ lute, PR w/ drum, Niv's w/
lute, PR w/ drum). The only time I got attacked is when he
was being pushed up a wall and I missed the "back off"
message. It's also my standard lineup when fighting LDCs.
It hasn't been that big a taunt in my experience.

It does make you aware that your remaining hp is merely a
state of being - i.e. whether you're at full hp or half is
pretty much irrelevant. What determines whether you're going
to live or die is whether the rate you're taking damage
exceeds the rate you're healing.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
